summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to condemnation proceedings under Ordinance 106846, King County Cause No. 837834 to acquire an easement in Tract 17, Rainier Beach Garden Tracts, necessary for the 55th Avenue South et al. sanitary sewer project, accepting a condemnation award in connection therewith and making an appropriation from the Municipal Sewerage 1971 Construction Fund for payment.
